CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.5.7, drugcumulativedosageunit (3AN)
E2B (R3): G.k.5b Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (unit) Conformance: Optional, but required if G.k.5a is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.25 Value Allowed: Constrained UCUM codes: {DF}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The cumulative dose provided is the total dose administered until the first sign, symptom, or reaction.
CustomField.label: Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (Unit)
